title: Chilli chilli chicken
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '500g chicken breast fillets, cut into chunks', '1 heaped teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 tablespoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 green pepper, roughly chopped', '1 yellow pepper, roughly chopped', '1 medium red chilli, diced', '500g passata', '250ml chicken stock', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained']
